title: Naruto
description: Follow the journey of Naruto Uzumaki.
fullDescription: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon fox spirit, dreams of becoming the Hokage of his village while forming bonds and battling enemies.

title: Your Name
description: Two strangers mysteriously connected by fate.
fullDescription: A high school boy in Tokyo and a girl in rural Japan discover they’re connected in a magical way.

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: A psychic's quest for self-discovery
fullDescription: Mob, a shy teen with immense psychic powers, tries to live a normal life and control his emotions while dealing with spirits and rival espers. His journey explores self-growth, personal strength, and human connection in the face of chaos.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Space bounty hunters chase danger and their pasts
fullDescription: In a futuristic space setting, a crew of bounty hunters called the Bebop take on missions while confronting their emotional pasts. The series blends action, jazz music, and deep existential themes in a stylish sci-fi universe.

title: Attack on Titan
description: The battle between humans and titans.
fullDescription: Humanity fights to survive against giant man-eating titans. Follow Eren and his friends in this dark fantasy epic.

title: Demon Slayer
description: A brother's mission to cure his demon sister.
fullDescription: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a Demon Slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister turns into a demon.

title: One Piece
description: Join Luffy on his quest for the One Piece.
fullDescription: Monkey D. Luffy sets out to become the Pirate King by finding the legendary One Piece treasure hidden in the Grand Line.

title: Spirited Away
description: A magical journey through a spirit world.
fullDescription: Chihiro stumbles into a world of gods and spirits and must find a way to save her parents and return home.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: Goku fights intergalactic foes to protect Earth.
fullDescription: Saiyans, Frieza, Cell, Buu... Goku faces all of them in his quest to save the universe.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: A high schooler gains powerful cursed energy to fight supernatural threats.
fullDescription: Yuuji Itadori swallows a cursed object to save his friends and joins the Tokyo Jujutsu High School, where he battles curses with fellow students and powerful sorcerers.

title: Chainsaw Man
description: Denji becomes a devil hunter with a chainsaw dog.
fullDescription: Denji makes a contract with his pet devil Pochita and becomes Chainsaw Man. Now working for the government, he hunts devils while struggling with human desires and dark forces.

title: Your Lie in April
description: A piano prodigy rediscovers music through a free-spirited violinist.
fullDescription: Kousei Arima loses the ability to hear the piano after his mother's death, until he meets Kaori Miyazono, a violinist who changes his life and helps him find his rhythm again.

title: Death Note
description: A notebook grants the power to kill by writing names.
fullDescription: High school student Light Yagami discovers the Death Note, a notebook that kills anyone whose name is written in it. He begins a crusade against criminals, pursued by the mysterious detective L.

title: My Hero Academia
description: A boy without powers enrolls in a hero academy.
fullDescription: Izuku Midoriya lives in a world where almost everyone has superpowers, but he was born powerless. After inheriting a powerful quirk from All Might, he joins U.A. High School to become a hero.

title: Vivy: Fluorite Eye's Song
description: An AI songstress must save humanity across time.
fullDescription: Vivy, an AI songstress, is tasked with rewriting the future to prevent a war between humans and AIs. She must sing from the heart while battling across 100 years of history.

title: Violet Evergarden
description: An ex-soldier learns to understand emotions.
fullDescription: After the war, Violet Evergarden becomes a letter writer to better understand emotions and herself. Her journey reveals powerful stories of love, loss, and humanity.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: A haunting tale of war and loss
fullDescription: Grave of the Fireflies is a powerful and emotional Studio Ghibli film about two siblings trying to survive in war-torn Japan. After losing their home and mother, Seita and Setsuko struggle with hunger, sorrow, and the brutal realities of World War II. A heartbreaking yet beautifully told story of love, resilience, and tragedy.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
description: A mysterious castle, a cursed girl, and a heartwarming tale
fullDescription: Sophie, a young woman cursed to become an old lady, seeks the help of the mysterious and powerful wizard Howl, who lives in a magical moving castle. Together, they unravel dark magic, war, and discover courage, love, and inner beauty.

title: Hunter x Hunter (1999)
description: A young boy becomes a Hunter like his father
fullDescription: Gon Freecss leaves his island home to become a Hunter and search for his missing father. Along the way, he meets friends, faces deadly challenges, and discovers the true meaning of strength, purpose, and friendship.

title: Weathering with You
description: Love shines through the stormy skies.
fullDescription: Hodaka Morishima runs away to Tokyo during a time of unusual rain, where he meets Hina Amano — a girl who has the mysterious power to stop the rain and bring sunshine. Together, they forge a bond amidst social and supernatural pressures in a breathtaking story about love, weather, and sacrifice.
